name: Necroanimalis
description:
Set foot as an apprentice Necromancer hired for the sake of resurrecting dead pets in this quirky pixel art rendered world where magic and technological exist cohesively in a modern society.

Story:

You are offered a job at Necroanimalis Clinic as a Pet Necromancer and is tasked to meet with customers in the neighborhood and help them resurrect their beloved dead pets. You will need to collect ingredients from around the area and use those ingredients in your resurrection spell. Speak with pet owners, help bring their beloved pets back to life, and uncover a hidden mystery lurking in this modern day magic cum technology society.

Game Jam notice:

This game is made for the Game Dev Network Big Festive Jam 2020 and is released as a free non-commercial game.

Genre: Adventure, Visual Novel, and Point-n-click.

Playtime: 10 - 20 minutes.

The game contains some element of pixel hunting and long dialog sequences. No animals were harmed in the making of this game.
